hbgdkiStudyRegistryNumber.name: ID Number
hbgdkiStudyRegistryNumber.description: ID number for the study per the registry.

hbgdkiIntervention.name: Intervention
hbgdkiIntervention.description: If an interventional study, describe the interventions.

hbgdkiLowerLimitAge.name: Lower limit of age at enrollment
hbgdkiLowerLimitAge.description: Lower limit of age at enrollment.

hbgdkiUpperLimitAge.name: Upper limit of age at enrollment
hbgdkiUpperLimitAge.description: Upper limit of age at enrollment.

hbgdkiBiosampleType.name: Types of biosamples collected, if any
hbgdkiBiosampleType.description: Types of biosamples used (e.g., Blood, Stool,...).

hbgdkiMaternalChar.name: Maternal characteristics
hbgdkiMaternalChar.description: Dataset parameters can include: age, height, weight, obstetric history.

hbgdkiPregnancyBirth.name: Pregnancy and birth
hbgdkiPregnancyBirth.description: Dataset parameters can include: Morbidity, nutrition, ANC, delivery method and setting.
